verses.verse: בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah פֶּ֧רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> Pe-retz Pharez חֶצְר֛וֹן <S%H2696><s%> chetz-Ron Hezron וְכַרְמִ֖י <S%H3756><s%> ve-char-Mi and Carmi וְח֥וּר <S%H2354><s%> ve-Chur and Hur וְשׁוֹבָֽל׃ <S%H7732><s%> ve-sho-Val. and Shobal

וּרְאָיָ֤ה <S%H7211><s%> u-re-'a-Yah And Reaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son שׁוֹבָל֙ <S%H7732><s%> sho-Val of Shobal הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יַ֔חַת <S%H3189><s%> Ya-chat, Jahath וְיַ֣חַת <S%H3189><s%> ve-Ya-chat and Jahath הֹלִ֔יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid, begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲחוּמַ֖י <S%H267><s%> 'a-chu-Mai Ahumai וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et לָ֑הַד <S%H3855><s%> La-had; and Lahad אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These מִשְׁפְּח֥וֹת <S%H4940><s%> mish-pe-Chot These [are] the families הַצָּֽרְעָתִֽי׃ <S%H6882><s%> hatz-Tza-re-'a-Ti. of the Zorathites ס sa-Mek

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh These אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi And these [were of] the father עֵיטָ֔ם <S%H5862><s%> 'ei-Tam, of Etam יִזְרְעֶ֥אל <S%H3157><s%> yiz-re-'El Jezreel וְיִשְׁמָ֖א <S%H3457><s%> ve-yish-Ma and Ishma וְיִדְבָּ֑שׁ <S%H3031><s%> ve-yid-Bash; and Idbash וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem and the name אֲחוֹתָ֖ם <S%H269><s%> a-cho-Tam of their sister הַצְלֶלְפּֽוֹנִי׃ <S%H6753><s%> hatz-lel-Po-ni. [was] Hazelelponi

וּפְנוּאֵל֙ <S%H6439><s%> u-fe-nu-'El And Penuel אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi the father גְדֹ֔ר <S%H1446><s%> ge-Dor, of Gedor וְעֵ֖זֶר <S%H5829><s%> ve-'E-zer and Ezer אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi the father חוּשָׁ֑ה <S%H2364><s%> chu-Shah; of Hushah אֵ֤לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- These [are] the sons חוּר֙ <S%H2354><s%> chur of Hur בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> be-Chor the firstborn אֶפְרָ֔תָה <S%H672><s%> 'ef-Ra-tah, of Ephratah אֲבִ֖י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi the father בֵּ֥ית beit לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H1035><s%> La-chem. of Bethlehem

וּלְאַשְׁחוּר֙ <S%H806><s%> u-le-'ash-Chur And Ashur אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi the father תְק֔וֹעַ <S%H8620><s%> te-Ko-a', of Tekoa הָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu had שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> she-Tei had two נָשִׁ֑ים <S%H802><s%> na-Shim; wives חֶלְאָ֖ה <S%H2458><s%> chel-'Ah Helah וְנַעֲרָֽה׃ <S%H5292><s%> ve-na-'a-Rah. and Naarah

וַתֵּ֨לֶד <S%H3205><s%> vat-Te-led bare ל֤וֹ lo נַעֲרָה֙ <S%H5292><s%> na-'a-Rah And Naarah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲחֻזָּ֣ם <S%H275><s%> 'a-chuz-Zam him Ahuzam וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et חֵ֔פֶר <S%H2660><s%> Che-fer, and Hepher וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et תֵּימְנִ֖י <S%H8488><s%> teim-Ni and Temeni וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָאֲחַשְׁתָּרִ֑י <S%H326><s%> ha-'a-chash-ta-Ri; and Haahashtari אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei These [were] the sons נַעֲרָֽה׃ <S%H5292><s%> na-'a-Rah. of Naarah

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons חֶלְאָ֑ה <S%H2458><s%> chel-'Ah; of Helah צֶ֥רֶת <S%H6889><s%> Tze-ret [were] Zereth; יִצְחָר yitz-char כוְצֹ֖חַר <S%H3328><s%> ve-Tzo-char Jitschar קוְאֶתְנָֽן׃ <S%H869><s%> ve-'et-Nan. and Ethnan

וְק֣וֹץ <S%H6976><s%> ve-Kotz And Coz הוֹלִ֔יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid, begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עָנ֖וּב <S%H6036><s%> 'a-Nuv Anub וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַצֹּבֵבָ֑ה <S%H6637><s%> hatz-tzoe-Vah; and Zobebah וּמִשְׁפְּח֥וֹת <S%H4940><s%> u-mish-pe-Chot and the families אֲחַרְחֵ֖ל <S%H316><s%> 'a-char-Chel of Aharhel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son הָרֽוּם׃ <S%H2037><s%> ha-Rum. of Harum

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become יַעְבֵּ֔ץ <S%H3258><s%> ya'-Betz, And Jabez נִכְבָּ֖ד <S%H3513><s%> nich-Bad was more honourable מֵאֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> me-'e-Chav; than his brethren וְאִמּ֗וֹ <S%H517><s%> ve-'im-Mo, and his mother קָרְאָ֨ה <S%H7121><s%> ka-re-'Ah called שְׁמ֤וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo his name יַעְבֵּץ֙ <S%H3258><s%> ya'-Betz Jabez לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because יָלַ֖דְתִּי <S%H3205><s%> ya-Lad-ti Because I bare בְּעֹֽצֶב׃ <S%H6090><s%> be-'O-tzev. him with sorrow

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called יַ֠עְבֵּץ <S%H3258><s%> Ya'-betz And Jabez לֵאלֹהֵ֨י <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Hei on the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- Oh that בָּרֵ֨ךְ <S%H1288><s%> ba-Rech thou wouldest bless תְּבָרֲכֵ֜נִי <S%H1288><s%> te-va-ra-Che-ni me indeed וְהִרְבִּ֤יתָ <S%H7235><s%> ve-hir-Bi-ta and enlarge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- גְּבוּלִי֙ <S%H1366><s%> ge-vu-Li my coast וְהָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-ye-Tah become יָדְךָ֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-Cha and that thine hand עִמִּ֔י <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mi, would וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta might be with me and that thou wouldest keep מֵּרָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> me-ra-'Ah [me] from evil לְבִלְתִּ֣י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti that may not עָצְבִּ֑י <S%H6087><s%> 'a-tze-Bi; that it may not grieve וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Ve granted אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him me And God אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- what שָׁאָֽל׃ <S%H7592><s%> sha-'Al. him that which he requested

וּכְל֥וּב <S%H3620><s%> u-che-Luv And Chelub אֲחִֽי־ <S%H251><s%> 'a-chi- the brother שׁוּחָ֖ה <S%H7746><s%> shu-Chah of Shuah הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מְחִ֑יר <S%H4243><s%> me-Chir; Mehir ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu who אֲבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi which [was] the father אֶשְׁתּֽוֹן׃ <S%H850><s%> esh-Ton. of Eshton

וְאֶשְׁתּ֗וֹן <S%H850><s%> ve-'esh-Ton, And Eshton הוֹלִ֞יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֵּ֤ית beit רָפָא֙ <S%H1051><s%> ra-Fa Bethrapha וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et פָּסֵ֔חַ <S%H6454><s%> pa-Se-ach, and Paseah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et תְּחִנָּ֖ה <S%H8468><s%> te-chin-Nah and Tehinnah אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi the father עִ֣יר 'ir נָחָ֑שׁ <S%H5904><s%> na-Chash; of Irnahash אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei are the men רֵכָֽה׃ <S%H7397><s%> re-Chah. of Rechah ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons קְנַ֔ז <S%H7073><s%> ke-Naz, of Kenaz עָתְנִיאֵ֖ל <S%H6274><s%> 'a-te-ni-'El Othniel וּשְׂרָיָ֑ה <S%H8304><s%> u-se-ra-Yah; and Seraiah וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei and the sons עָתְנִיאֵ֖ל <S%H6274><s%> 'a-te-ni-'El of Othniel חֲתַֽת׃ <S%H2867><s%> cha-Tat. Hathath

וּמְעוֹנֹתַ֖י <S%H4587><s%> u-me-'o-no-Tai And Meonothai הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עָפְרָ֑ה <S%H6084><s%> 'a-fe-Rah; Ophrah וּשְׂרָיָ֗ה <S%H8304><s%> u-se-ra-Yah, and Seraiah הוֹלִ֤יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יוֹאָב֙ <S%H3097><s%> yo-'Av Joab אֲבִי֙ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi the father גֵּ֣יא <S%H1516><s%> gei of the valley חֲרָשִׁ֔ים <S%H2798><s%> cha-ra-Shim, of Charashim כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for חֲרָשִׁ֖ים <S%H2796><s%> cha-ra-Shim were craftsmen הָיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu. become פ Peh

וּבְנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons כָּלֵ֣ב <S%H3612><s%> ka-Lev of Caleb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְפֻנֶּ֔ה <S%H3312><s%> ye-fun-Neh, of Jephunneh עִ֥ירוּ <S%H5900><s%> 'I-ru Iru אֵלָ֖ה <S%H425><s%> 'e-Lah Elah וָנָ֑עַם <S%H5277><s%> va-Na-'am; and Naam וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei and the sons אֵלָ֖ה <S%H425><s%> 'e-Lah of Elah וּקְנַֽז׃ <S%H7073><s%> u-ke-Naz. even Kenaz

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons יְהַלֶּלְאֵ֑ל <S%H3094><s%> ye-hal-lel-'El; of Jehaleleel זִ֣יף <S%H2128><s%> zif Ziph וְזִיפָ֔ה <S%H2129><s%> ve-zi-Fah, and Ziphah תִּירְיָ֖א <S%H8493><s%> tir-Ya Tiria וַאֲשַׂרְאֵֽל׃ <S%H840><s%> va-'a-sar-'El. and Asareel

וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> u-ven- And the sons עֶזְרָ֔ה <S%H5834><s%> 'ez-Rah, of Ezra יֶ֥תֶר <S%H3500><s%> Ye-ter [were] Jether וּמֶ֖רֶד <S%H4778><s%> u-Me-red and Mered וְעֵ֣פֶר <S%H6081><s%> ve-'E-fer and Epher וְיָל֑וֹן <S%H3210><s%> ve-ya-Lon; and Jalon וַתַּ֙הַר֙ <S%H2029><s%> vat-Ta-har and she bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִרְיָ֣ם <S%H4813><s%> mir-Yam Miriam וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שַׁמַּ֔י <S%H8060><s%> sham-Mai, and Shammai וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et יִשְׁבָּ֖ח <S%H3431><s%> yish-Bach and Ishbah אֲבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi the father אֶשְׁתְּמֹֽעַ׃ <S%H851><s%> 'esh-te-Mo-a'. of Eshtemoa

וְאִשְׁתּ֣וֹ <S%H802><s%> ve-'ish-To And his wife הַיְהֻדִיָּ֗ה <S%H3057><s%> hay-hu-di-Yah, Jehudijah יָלְדָ֞ה <S%H3205><s%> Yal-dah bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יֶ֨רֶד <S%H3382><s%> Ye-red Jered אֲבִ֤י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi the father גְדוֹר֙ <S%H1446><s%> ge-dOr of Gedor וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et חֶ֙בֶר֙ <S%H2268><s%> che-ver and Heber אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi the father שׂוֹכ֔וֹ <S%H7755><s%> so-Cho, of Socho וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et יְקֽוּתִיאֵ֖ל <S%H3354><s%> ye-ku-ti-'El and Jekuthiel אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi the father זָנ֑וֹחַ <S%H2182><s%> za-No-ach; of Zanoah וְאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh, another בְּנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei And these [are] the sons בִּתְיָ֣ה <S%H1332><s%> bit-Yah of Bithiah בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> vat- the daughter פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh, of Pharaoh אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after לָקַ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach took מָֽרֶד׃ <S%H4778><s%> Ma-red. which Mered ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet of [his] wife הֽוֹדִיָּ֔ה <S%H1940><s%> ho-di-Yah, Hodiah אֲח֣וֹת <S%H269><s%> a-Chot the sister נַ֔חַם <S%H5163><s%> Na-cham, of Naham אֲבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi the father קְעִילָ֖ה <S%H7084><s%> ke-'i-Lah of Keilah הַגַּרְמִ֑י <S%H1636><s%> hag-gar-Mi; the Garmite וְאֶשְׁתְּמֹ֖עַ <S%H851><s%> ve-'esh-te-Mo-a' and Eshtemoa הַמַּעֲכָתִֽי׃ <S%H4602><s%> ham-ma-'a-cha-Ti. the Maachathite

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons שִׁימ֔וֹן <S%H7889><s%> shi-Mon, of Shimon אַמְנ֣וֹן <S%H550><s%> am-Non [were] Amnon וְרִנָּ֔ה <S%H7441><s%> ve-rin-Nah, and Rinnah בֶּן־ ben- חָנָ֖ן <S%H1135><s%> cha-Nan Benhanan; וְתֹולֹון ve-to-lon כוְתִילֹ֑ון <S%H8436><s%> ve-ti-Lon; birth קוּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons יִשְׁעִ֔י <S%H3469><s%> yish-'I, of Ishi זוֹחֵ֖ת <S%H2105><s%> zo-Chet [were] Zoheth וּבֶן־ u-ven- זוֹחֵֽת׃ <S%H1132><s%> zo-Chet. and Benzoheth

בְּנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons שֵׁלָ֣ה <S%H7956><s%> she-Lah of Shelah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah עֵ֚ר <S%H6147><s%> 'er [were] Er אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi the father לֵכָ֔ה <S%H3922><s%> le-Chah, of Lecah וְלַעְדָּ֖ה <S%H3935><s%> ve-la'-Dah and Laadah אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi the father מָרֵשָׁ֑ה <S%H4762><s%> ma-re-Shah; of Mareshah וּמִשְׁפְּח֛וֹת <S%H4940><s%> u-mish-pe-Chot and the families בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- of the house עֲבֹדַ֥ת <S%H5656><s%> 'a-vo-Dat of them that wrought הַבֻּ֖ץ <S%H948><s%> hab-Butz fine linen לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit of the house אַשְׁבֵּֽעַ׃ <S%H791><s%> 'ash-Be-a'. of Ashbea

וְיוֹקִ֞ים <S%H3137><s%> ve-yo-Kim And Jokim וְאַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> ve-'an-Shei and the men כֹזֵבָ֗א <S%H3578><s%> cho-ze-Va, of Chozeba וְיוֹאָ֧שׁ <S%H3101><s%> ve-yo-'Ash and Joash וְשָׂרָ֛ף <S%H8315><s%> ve-sa-Raf and Saraph אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who בָּעֲל֥וּ <S%H1166><s%> ba-'a-Lu who had the dominion לְמוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> le-mo-'Av in Moab וְיָשֻׁ֣בִי ve-ya-Shu-vi לָ֑חֶם <S%H3433><s%> La-chem; and Jashubilehem וְהַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> ve-had-de-va-Rim things עַתִּיקִֽים׃ <S%H6267><s%> 'at-ti-Kim. And [these are] ancient
